page.title: 10LOCAL MEDIA ST.NINIANS.
page.content: In St.Niniains the most popular {newspaper}is the Daily Record.It is one of twelve different newspapers sold in this area.Comics are also very popular in this area.The most popular {comics}are the"DANDY"for boys and the "JACKIE"for girls.Most people place orders for their comics etc. to be delivered to their door.45 different comics are delivered this way.For {magazines}the BMX type are the most popular.For women there are various magazines for example the "Womans Own" and "Woman".On the{radio}we can receive nine different programs.There are Radios 1,2,3 and 4 with 4 other stations.Our two most popular radio stations are Radios 1 and 2. The most popular{videos}are "Romancing the Stone" and "Connan the Destroyer". The two videos are adventure types. (K. MUIR, E. TAYLOR, J. MACDONALD)
